pkgmetadata.longdescription: Algorithms and framework for Nonnegative Matrix Factorization (NMF) // This package provides a framework to perform Non- negative Matrix Factorization (NMF). It implements a set of already published algorithms and seeding methods, and provides a framework to test, develop and plug new/custom algorithms. Most of the built-in algorithms have been optimized in C++, and the main interface function provides an easy way of performing parallel computations on multicore machines.
